sourcesContent:
{{instrument}}
{{grades}}
  • {{i.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; export interface gradesList { name: string; classname: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-instrument', templateUrl: './instrument.component.html', styleUrls: ['./instrument.component.css'] }) export class InstrumentComponent implements OnInit { instrument = "Instrument"; grades = "Grades / Diplomas"; public data: gradesList[] = []; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { this.data = this.getGradesData(); } getGradesData() : gradesList[]{ return [ { name : "Initiat", classname: "" }, { name : "1", classname: "" }, { name : "2", classname: "" }, { name : "3", classname: "" }, { name : "4", classname: "" }, { name : "5", classname: "" }, { name : "6", classname: "" }, { name : "7", classname: "" }, { name : "8", classname: "" }, { name : "ATCL", classname: "static-width" }, { name : "LTCL", classname: "static-width" }, { name : "FTCL", classname: "static-width" }, ] } }
